snippet: Andy Pettitte pitched six innings and Derek Jeter made a hustle play as Joe Girardi watched his Yankees complete a three-game sweep of the Mets.
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte pitched six innings and Derek Jeter made a hustle play as Joe Girardi watched his Yankees complete a three-game sweep of the Mets.

headline.seo: An Older Pettitte Settles Into a New Groove
headline.main: An Older Pettitte Settles Into a New Groove
headline.print_headline: An Older Pettitte Settles Into a New Groove
